Text: Want a Wiiware title you don't see on here? Let me know and I'll upload it.

Anyone have a good link to where I can read up on how to play a Wiiware game on a hacked Wii?

Is it as easy as putting onto a WBFS formatted USB drive and playing with a USB loader?

Thanks, either way!
How can you convert this wad into a iso?
didn't know you could convert to iso, i just install with wad manager
Never used wad manager. Using wbfs manager . . .

Amongst the scene, there is an application called "WAD2ISO" that I suspect strongly will turn a WAD into an ISO.

So, if I convert this WAD to am ISO, can I then either burn it and play using DarkCorp, or do I need to install the resulting ISO on a WBFS formatted USB drive?

Otherwise, do I just drop the game in a folder on the USB drive and load with a USB loader?

Anyone?
What is the benefit of converting wads to iso? I haven't heard of anyone doing that.
I believe the wisdom lies in that the ISO can then be burned to DVD and played like a "normal" game?
